Shen.name: ShenБ
Shen.title: БбEye of TwilightБ
Shen.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙThere exists an ancient order originating in the Ionian Isles dedicated to the preservation of balance. Order, chaos, light, darkness -- all things must exist in perfect harmony for such is the way of the universe. This order is known as the Kinkou and it employs a triumvirate of shadow warriors to uphold its causes in the world. Shen is one of these shadow warriors, entrusted with the sacred duty of Watching the Stars - exercising judgment untainted by prejudice.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПBorn to a clan whose members have decorated the ranks of the Kinkou for generations, Shen was trained his entire life to become the Eye of Twilight, and thereupon to dispassionately determine what must be done in the interests of equilibrium. As his final trial to ascend to this position, he was made to attend the Takanu, a ceremony in which his father was tortured before his eyes to test his resolve. Any reaction whatsoever would have resulted in his immediate disqualification, but he never averted his gaze and never blinked, not once. As the Eye of Twilight, Shen must make decisions that would buckle the wills of ordinary men, removing all emotion from the equation. He now works with his fellows Akali and Kennen to enforce the balance of Valoran. This hallowed pursuit has unsurprisingly led the triumvirate to the Fields of Justice.ПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗThe Eye of Twilight sees not the despair of its victims, only the elegance of equilibrium.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
Shen.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙThere exists an ancient order originating in the Ionian Isles dedicated to the preservation of balance.  Order, chaos, light, darkness -- all things must exist in perfect harmony for such is the way of ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзИShadow Dash restores more energy if it hits multiple enemy champions, so don't always use it on a single target.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлTry to keep an eye on your allies' health, even if in remote lanes, as Stand United can be used anywhere on the map.  You can use F2-F5 to target them quickly.лЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиShen is a very durable champion, with multiple ways to absorb damage.  Be wary about attacking him when he seems weak.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйHe can also teleport to any ally's aid, regardless of location, so be aware that a 1v1 fight can turn into 1v2 very quickly with Shen.ЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.description: БбГгДдЖжDamages target unit and life taps him, healing allies that attack the target.ЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
Deals Б{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгД magic damage to target unit and marks them for ДгГбБ{{ e4 }}Б seconds.Б

БбГгKilling an enemy with Vorpal Blade restores ДгГбБ{{ f3 }}Бб Health instantly instead.ГбБ

spells.description: БбГгДдShen shields himself, absorbing incoming damage for a few seconds.ЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжWhile Feint holds, his attacks reduce Ki Strike's cooldown by an additional ЖдДгГбБ{{ e5 }}Б second.Б

spells.name: БShadow DashБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИShen dashes rapidly toward a target location, taunting enemy champions he encounters and dealing minor damage.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгShen dashes in a direction, dealing ГбБ{{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгДдЖ magic damage to champions and taunting champions he collides with for ЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }}Б second(s).Б

БбГгДTaunted enemies are forced to attack Shen and deal ДгГбБ{{ e3 }}Бб% reduced damage.Б

БRestores Б{{ e2 }}БбГ Energy per champion affected.ГбБ

spells.name: БStand UnitedБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзShen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдPlaces a shield on target allied champion, absorbing ДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГг damage for 5 seconds. After channeling for ДгГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГгД seconds, Shen teleports to the target's location.ДгГбБ

passive.description: БбГгДдEvery 8 seconds, Shen's next attack deals bonus damage.ДгГбБ
